website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind its uninspired aesthetics, the Definitive Technology ProSub 800 is a mighty little subwoofer and a fine match for its SSA soundbars and ProCinema satellite speakers.
pros: The Definitive Technology ProSub 800 has an 8-inch powered subwoofer with separate 8-inch passive radiator

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this sub. Especially after reading all the great reviews. This sub only sounded ok at very low volumes. Once you turn it up, it gets very boomy and rattles like it’s coming apart. Movies sounded ok at best. Listening to music was just plain awful. Music sounded better after I disconnected the sub altogether. Perhaps I got a defective one and the driver itself was damaged or the box itself wasn’t sealed properly. All I know is it was an extreme disappointment at that price point. Returning to Amazon and looking into other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Coard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sub!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I went to Best Buy and they recommended this sub. I bought it through Amazon though. I did a lot of research and was satisfied with the reviews and technology behind it. I am so glad I got a sub that seems to be about one third the size of the 12 inch sub I was looking to buy. My wife is also glad. I cannot believe the sound that comes out of this little box. I love good clean bass. The sub will not disappoint. -Still true 2 years later. I love it and I’m still impressed.
customer_reviews.author: G Saunders

customer_reviews.title: I love this subwoofer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago. The bass is deep and rich, not distorted at all, even at louder volumes It was superior to my existing powered subwoofer and I liked it so much that I bought a second one the following week. I don't want to sound like a cheerleader, but this is just what you want for your AVR system.
customer_reviews.author: Real History

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofers made after 2012 are more flexible with updated crossover control options!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with the Definitive Technology Incline desktop speakers. It takes the Incline to the next level - a quantum leap (or two) in sound quality. Greater clarity, more available volume, increased transparency, and superior imaging and sound staging. The Amazon description and the earlier reviews are wrong for the subwoofers made after 2012. The crossover control does work with ANY and ALL inputs. I used the RCA subwoofer output from the inclines to the RCA subwoofer input in the sub, with the crossover frequency set between 85 and 100 hz (per a suggestion from Definitive Technology customer support). Highly recommended combination if you are able to use the Inclines.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: My old Definitive Technology Pro subwoofer died a quiet death and sadly cheaper to buy a new one than to repair it hence I purchased this new subwoofer. since it is a little bit better version of my old one it sounds better I think and of course installation was easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low budget subwoofer.
customer_reviews.text: 5 star packaging to begin with; none better that I've experienced. Once unpackaged, the instructions and controls are very clear. The bass is a little soft and not as tight as some of my other subs, but the overall sound is good and adds to my small bookcase speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great low end and easy to hide
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sub for the price. Once placed in the best position it pumps out all the bass I need for a pair of Polk s20 speakers. Makes the S20 speakers sound rich with punchy bass not muddy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Stolz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this 8 inch sub woofer. Nice and tight and punchy and warm and transparent if you need it to be with plenty of power if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fadel

customer_reviews.title: Definitive ProSub 800 - great small subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sub-woofer for an average to medium large room. Even though it is physically small for a sub-woofer, it puts out a lot of tight bass. I have driven it fairly hard, the sound is always clear and tight, never boomy or distorted. In summary, if you are looking for a well priced, high performance, good looking sub-woofer, you should consider the ProSub 800.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for music.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help fill in the bottom end for Def Tech BP10s. Only used for listening to music. Perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: interface
customer_reviews.text: GOOD FOR ITS SIZE. Will clip on some movies. I really need a bigger one. Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Holstad

customer_reviews.title: shakin' the walls!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a condo and this sub is shaking the walls. I LOVE IT! Have it hooked up to a Denon 950H receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My living room is decked out with seven Def Tech speakers -- so when my old computer speakers blew up, I decided to upgrade the office. Purchased a semi-cheap receiver and plugged it into the computer, along with two DT ProMonitor 1000 speakers and this -- and now I have the perfect environment for listening to jazz or Metallica while working. I've had this for about five months now and I've had zero problems, and the sound for such a little box is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: LoveTheCoast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd unit! The predecessors each lasted over 5 years. Superb quality with Procinema 60.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a bad polk sub woofer
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a bad polk subwoofer that was suffering from some annoying buzz. The sound is much better than the polk model ever was. I also love the side dial and the design. Very happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Swift

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have had a pair of these for 2.5 years. They add so much to movies and games. For the money, these can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sub mainly to listen to music...... For the money this is a high quality device and worth every penny.... Very clear high quality sound.... Capable of a lot more than just music.... You won't go wrong with this purchase.....
customer_reviews.author: Yurij

customer_reviews.title: Great Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Surprising amount of bass. Once I had the crossover properly dialed in with the rest of the system the level of bass is excellent. Plenty of punch when needed and offers the perfect level of bass at various tones. It's Definitive! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A well designed, high quality product. Perfect in 5.1 or 7.1 systems when used with 4 or 6 ProMonitor 800 speakers and a ProCenter 1000 speaker. All inputs included and features a volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Benz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home Theater
customer_reviews.text: You have to wait for this to break in for good power output, may have built into circuit board, works as good as REL now after 48 hour run-in. Good for an 8 inch, but missing bottom frequencies, need 12 inch for 20 HZ specification.
customer_reviews.author: spence

customer_reviews.title: The ProSub works perfectly and is better than the same product I purchased from a high-end ...
customer_reviews.text: The ProSub works perfectly and is better than the same product I purchased from a high-end entertainment store. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Boom! Let this break in for a few hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Boom! Let this break in for a few hours then crank it up!
customer_reviews.author: steven rogers

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!  You will be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kick. Best mid price range sub I have found. Clear, crisp bass. Hits even the lowest of notes well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pro sub 800
customer_reviews.text: Pro sub 800 a step up from the 600 series great upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Bass is good for the open box price
customer_reviews.text: Bass is good for the open box price...but the sub was defective, danced on the floor and untold able distortion from 2/3 volume up. Return was not a problem, but sending defective sub was wrong, shown no initial quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: First off, the package arrived damaged and I had to return it. Amazon was terrific on the return. I ended up visiting a local, brick and mortar, speciality stereo store and picked up the subwoofer for $50.00 less than Amazon. Tax brought the price closer. When I got home, the sub would power on, but there was no sound. I tried to trouble shoot over the phone, but we couldn't get it to work. I took it back to the store and they were able to get it going, but it wasn't very impressive. There was some sound on a particlarly bassy movie, but still not very loud. I returned and ordered a differ brand from Amazon. I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Potter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back, was able to repair my old one
customer_reviews.author: Bruce & Deb

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want bass without having to replace it in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd of these subs. The first two simply quit. Now all my bass has to come through speakers ill equipped to handle bass. The latest one rattles so bad during any sort of bass that we can’t use it. And I can’t find anyone from the manufacturer that will help with the warranty, return or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable for its size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little sub. I run rwo of them in my system. The bass is deep without being boomy or thudding. It incorporates a beefy 300 watt RMS MOSFET amp that will sometimes cause the sub to dance around the floor. I put mine on isolation mounts to prevent that. The volme control is a handy feature as are the various ways to connect it to the source. I took off one star because Def Tech rates the frequency response down to 20 hz. In reality the bottom end is 30 hz. Also a detractor is Def Tech's customer support that leaves a lot to be desired. All in all, though, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Matter

customer_reviews.title: ... think that an 8” sub can’t really do that great. You’d think that you'd be better off with ...
customer_reviews.text: You’d think that an 8” sub can’t really do that great. You’d think that you'd be better off with a 10" sub that's lower in quality vs the 8" from a higher end brand like def tech. Not so fast. This thing really hits deep, solid lows. Many people have been so surprised at what this thing puts out for how small it is in my house. Beyond that, I really don't think you can go wrong with def tech stuff and this sub is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Killer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not an audiophile/hobbyist, but I wanted good bass in my video games and movies. Was kind of choking on the ticket price of this sub, as I've always had integrated subs before. This thing kills it. Now that I've had this subwoofer, I won't ever go back, and I don't think I'll ever need/want another one. Can't imagine the sound getting any better! Thank you, DefTech!
customer_reviews.author: Nox Helios

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. Not flimsy at all all like a ported sub. Tight, accurate and very simple. Very versatile for movies or music. Hits super low with ease and recovers lightning quick. Fills a 20*16 theater room easily at halfway. Very easy to place due to size.
customer_reviews.author: sf1185

customer_reviews.title: good sound
customer_reviews.text: Connected Pioneer vsx 1021 with prosub 800 with pro monitor 800 front & center speakers and the system sounds great. initially has issues with sub turning off automatically while playing video and sometimes it never comes back up (especially during night times don't know why) even after re plugging the power cable sub stays power off. after re connecting the whole system it works perfect now I connected sub to receiver with speaker cable instead of with sub-woofer cable and then sub to front speakers, with this setup sub is auto turning on with no issues so far. will post if I see any issues.
customer_reviews.author: N. Yalavarthi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great deep bass in a small foot print. Little pricey but nice.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Bumpin.
customer_reviews.text: This sub produces excellent amounts of low end for its diminutive size. Has everything I was looking for in a new high end home audio setup. The auto-off and side volume control are huge pluses. Great for music AND movies, very impressed. Paired with definitive tech procenter 2000 and promonitor 1000's, this is a match made in heaven. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: MDK

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sub after weeks of research and testing. I tested everything from definitive tech, phase tech, mirage, klipsch, polk, and many others and this sub fit the bill in both size and sound quality for my 17x13 room. Because it is down firing you feel very explosion the seat of the pants no matter where the sub is located. If your looking for some thump in a small package you cant go wrong with this sub.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend for close field application
customer_reviews.text: This sub is just o.k. Pros it works with my Def Tech Inclines and does produce bass Con bass is too directional I bought it off the 3 bay, and had I spent 300 plus for a new one I would have wanted a refund. Parting thought since I paid considerably less than retail I won't complain too much... I can't recommend for close field application...
customer_reviews.author: Son of the Most high

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This product completes the entire HD experience. Without it the system doesn't come to life.
customer_reviews.author: T. Weight

product_meta.title: Definitive Technology ProSub 800 - High Output Compact 300W Powered Subwoofer | Heart-thumping sound for Home Theater System | (Single, Black)
product_meta.description:
Definitive Technology Pro sub 800

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



The Low Frequency Effects (LFE) of a movie’s soundtrack bring excitement, realism and just plain fun to action, adventure and sci-fi movies. Accurate reproduction of the bottom octaves of all music, especially pipe organ, symphonic and rock add that last touch to bring you true you-are-there realism to your listening. Worry not, Definitive has bass down pat. The ProSub 800 features a 300 Watt amplifier driving a high-excursion 8 inch front-mounted direct-radiating woofer that is pressure-coupled to an 8 inch Low Bass radiator on the bottom of the enclosure. The net radiating area of the ProSub 800 is 27% greater than a single 10 inch woofer but with better speed, pitch definition and control.



Pressure-coupled Low Bass Radiator on the enclosure bottom works to produce deep, soul-stirring bass


Side-mounted volume control makes bass level adjustment easy and convenient

THE ULTIMATE IN BASS PERFORMANCE FOR MAXIMUM ENJOYMENT FROM YOUR MUSIC AND MOVIES
Definitive's ProSub 800 is an advanced technology subwoofer with built-in high-power, high-current amplifier and sophisticated electronic crossover in combination with an 8 inch driver of the highest quality. A complete array of controls and connections allows it to be hooked up to and perfectly integrated with any stereo or multi-channel audio system, and tuned for optimum performance in any room. The sonic result is accurate, awe-inspiring, high-impact, high-reality bass performance with superior transient response, vanishingly low distortion, stupendous subsonic power and high output capabilities. It is truly a unique combination of delicate musicality and thunderous power for the ultimate in home theater sound effects as well as unsurpassed musical excellence.



Available in both black and white


Connections for integration with any stereo or multi-channel audio system. View larger

ADVANCED MOSFET TECHNOLOGY AMPLIFIER
The ProSub 800 incorporates Definitive Technology's unique digitally-coupled Infinite Power Source amplifiers with high-current direct coupled power supplies and discrete MOSFET output devices to ensure perfect high-definition resolution and reproduction of the most dynamic program material and demanding sub-bass transients. Construction quality is absolutely state-of-the-art with only the highest quality components used including mil-spec glass epoxy circuit boards and precision resistors and capacitors for many years of faultless superior performance. In addition, tremendous current reserves, high peak-power capabilities and two protection circuits ensure that these subwoofers can never be overdriven. There is also a convenient, signal-sensing, auto on/off feature.

SUPERIOR DETAIL AND LIGHTNING-FAST TRANSIENT RESPONSE
The powerful, high-definition driver delivers rock-solid low distortion bass, reaching down to the lowest subsonic frequencies, with an outstanding quality of superior transient response. The special ultra-stiff, low-mass cone (for super-fast transient response) is joined to a butyl rubber surround and long-throw voice coil and spider. The incredibly rigid baskets are engineered to hold the massive magnet structures and large voice coils in absolute alignment. The high temperature voice coil is aluminum wound with triple insulated ultra-pure copper wire and baked in epoxy for power handling in excess of 750 watts.

ROCK SOLID NON-RESONANT CABINETS ENSURE PURE LOW DISTORTION RESPONSE
The cabinet of a loudspeaker plays a large part in its sonic performance. Resonance and vibration can add unwanted distortion as well as drain away important energy from the system. Definitive's subwoofers utilize monocoque cabinets, which have been specifically engineered to be totally inert and vibration free, to ensure you of absolutely pure sonic reproduction. Monocoque means that the cabinet is of a unitized construction where all panels are permanently joined together into one solid structure. The cabinet walls themselves are high-density MDF fused together by space-age polymer adhesives. The front and rear baffles are extra thick and the cabinets each incorporate multiple internal braces to ensure total solidity.

COMPLETELY ADJUSTABLE ELECTRONIC CROSSOVERS ASSURE A PERFECT MATCH TO YOUR SYSTEM AND ROOM
The sophisticated low distortion electronic crossover is a masterpiece of design and execution. It contains a complete range of hookups, circuitry and features which allow the subwoofers to be connected and perfectly blended with any system as well as adjusted for optimum performance in any room.

The ProSub 800 features a continuously adjustable low pass filter control which allow you to choose a high frequency roll-off of from 40 to 150 Hz. This unique "dual stage" roll-off is extremely steep which ensures perfect blending with your main speakers as well as eliminating unwanted midrange from the subwoofer. This is especially important because it gives you much greater flexibility in placing your subwoofer in your room without being able to hear where it is located. There is also a separate low-level direct LFE input for Dolby Digital which bypasses the crossover network. The subwoofer level control is conveniently mounted on the side of the enclosure instead of the rear panel, making it easy to reach. It allows you to perfectly adjust the volume of the subwoofer to match your system and room as well as to fulfill your own personal sonic preferences.



TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Driver Complement: One high-definition 8" woofer pressure coupled to one 8" low bass radiator
 * Frequency Response: 20 Hz – 150 Hz
 * Internal Amplifier Power: 300 watts
 * Auto On / Off: Signal Sensing
 * Power Requirements: 110 volts Alternating Current (US)
 * High Level Inputs: Two pairs of 5 way binding posts
 * High Level Outputs: Two pairs of 5 way binding posts
 * Low Level Inputs: One LFE input (for SW preout only)
 * High Pass Crossover: Non Variable 6 dB/octave @ 80 Hz: Available only with high level inputs and outputs
 * Low Pass Crossover: 24 dB/octave, continuously variable from 40 Hz – 150 Hz ( Available with high level inputs only)
 * Dimensions: 10-5/16" W x 15-3/4" D x 12-7/8" H (26.2 x 40.0 x 32.7 cm)
 * Weight: 26 lbs (11.8 kg)
feature_bullets: 300W RMS for a THUNDEROUS SOUL-SHAKING BASS RIGHT IN YOUR LIVING ROOM - ProSub 800 is equipped with a high excursion 8" front-mounted direct-radiating woofer pressure-coupled to an 8" low bass radiator

BRING HIGH DEFINITION MUSIC TO LIFE – Infinite Power Source Amplifier, Discrete MOSFET output devices, and a unique radiator design provides 27% greater radiating area than a single 10-inch woofer so you can enjoy deep impactful music anywhere

CREATE A FULL HOME THEATER SYSTEM - For an immersive cinematic experience, pair this sub with the ProCenter 1000 center channel and ProMonitor 800 satellite speakers or just add it to your existing setup for extra boom and punch

ADJUSTABLE FEET FOR BETTER STABILITY - The ProSub comes with four integrated feet with rubber tips for secure placement on any hard floor. You can even adjust the height, if the floor surface is uneven

ENDLESS CONNECTIONS AND EASY INTEGRATION - Connect this sub to any stereo or multi-channel audio system using the wide range of Line-Level & Speaker-Level Input & Output connections. It is very convenient and quick

THE PERFECT COMPLEMENT TO ANY AUDIO SYSTEM - Backed by Definitive Technology's relentless engineering, superior cinematic effects with ultimate musical realism and the award-winning design makes it the MOST SOUGHT-AFTER POWERED SUBWOOFER OF ALL TIME

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars90 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
